content.description:
70 degree overhanging sit start on the right arete to move up and then left for the crimp and then bump to the good pinch, take the jug and mantle right. 

  PS- if someone has the real name and FA for the route feel free to let me know or edit yourself.
content.protection: a pad or two. spotter for the topout.
content.location: Uphill due east from crystal ship, in the OW cluster, scramble, the problem faces north.

content.description: Justa couple of boulders. The main one is big and an obvious land mark, maybe 20 feet tall with 2 parrallel cracks running up the face and a cave under it. The other is a small boulder to the right with a good SDS problem on the arete starting from a big knob.
